usecase:
The platform is a digital insurance management system that allows customers to browse, compare, and purchase insurance policies such as health, motor, travel, and life insurance. Users can view policy details, premiums, coverage, and benefits, then complete secure online purchase and receive digital policy documents. Accounts include policy history, renewals, claims tracking, and profile management.

For administrators and insurers, the platform provides dashboards to manage products, pricing, customers, policies, and claims. It supports agent onboarding, policy approvals, and analytics reporting. The system is scalable, secure, and mobile-friendly, designed to simplify insurance discovery, purchase, and policy lifecycle management for customers and providers.
